plant.question: I have a stem and colorful petals. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I smell sweet!
🌻 I need sunshine and water to grow.
💐 People often give me as a gift.

plant.question: I grow tall and have many leaves. Birds like to build their nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I give shade on a sunny day.
🐿️ Squirrels love to climb me.
🪵 You can make paper from me.

plant.question: I am long and green, and I grow on a vine. I can be a yummy pickle!

hints.text: 🥒 I am a vegetable.
🥪 You can slice me and put me in a sandwich.
🥗 People eat me in salads.

plant.question: I am a plant that can sting you if you touch me! I have jagged leaves.

hints.text: 🩹 You might need a bandage if I touch you!
🍃 My name suggests that I can inflict pain.
🖐️ You should avoid touching me.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on trees. Monkeys love to eat me.

hints.text: 🌴 I grow in warm places.
🥥 I have sweet, white 'meat' inside.
💧 You can drink my water.

plant.question: I am a grain that is used to make bread. I grow in fields and turn golden in the summer.

hints.text: 🌾 Chickens like to eat me!
🍞 You can grind me into flour.
🚜 Farmers grow lots of me.

plant.question: I am a root vegetable that is orange and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me!

hints.text: 🥕 I am good for your eyes.
🥗 You can eat me raw or cooked.
🐛 Bugs Bunny's favorite snack!

plant.question: I am a plant with sharp thorns and beautiful, fragrant flowers.

hints.text: 🥀 I am often a symbol of love.
🌹 My name is a very common name for girls.
🖐️ Be careful when you pick me!

plant.question: I'm a seed inside a pod. I'm green or yellow, and good to eat, even for Goldilocks!

hints.text: 🍲 I'm often cooked in soups.
🌱 You can find me inside a long, green shell.
🥉 'Easy as...'!

plant.question: I'm a type of grass, but you usually eat my seeds. I am a staple food in many countries.

hints.text: 🍚 I can be long-grain, short-grain, or wild.
🌎 A huge part of the world eats me every day!
🥢 You might eat me with chopsticks.

transport.question: I have wheels and a seat, but I'm not a car. What am I?

hints.text: 🤸 You use your legs to make me go.
🌳 I'm fun to ride in the park.
🛣️ I can have a basket on the front.

transport.question: I travel on water and carry many people. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I float on the sea.
📢 I might have a horn that goes 'toot toot'.
⚓ You might take me on a vacation.

transport.question: I have wings and fly in the sky, but I'm not a bird. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I can take you very high.
💺 I have seats for lots of passengers.
✈️ I take you on vacations.

transport.question: I run on tracks and carry many carriages. What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I make a 'choo choo' sound.
🚦 I stop at stations.
🚝 I'm very long.

transport.question: I have four wheels and take you from place to place, but I'm not a bus. What am I?

hints.text: 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Families often use me.
🚦 I stop at traffic lights.
🔑 You need a key to start me.

transport.question: I'm big and carry lots of things, but I'm not a bus or a train. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I deliver goods to shops.
🚧 You might see me on a construction site.
🛢️ I can carry fuel.

transport.question: I fly high above the ground with spinning blades. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can land in small places.
🚨 Emergency services use me.
🌪️ My blades go 'whop whop whop'.

transport.question: I travel underwater, exploring the sea. What am I?

hints.text: ⚓ I can go very deep in the ocean.
🐠 I might see fish and coral.
🤿 People explore in me.

transport.question: I am like a motorcycle but have 3 wheels. What am I?

hints.text: 🧑‍⚕️ Sometimes they are small and used for deliveries
🇮🇳 In some countries, I am used as a taxi
🛵 I am called auto rishaw in some countries.

transport.question: I can take you to space and visit the moon. What am I?

hints.text: 👩‍🚀 Astronauts travel in me.
🌑 I'm very powerful and fast.
🚀 I have a countdown before lift-off.
